description: This file defines an interface 'NoteRepository' that extends JpaRepository for CRUD operations and custom query methods related to 'Note' entities in a Spring Data JPA context.

classes.name: NoteRepository
classes.description: Repository interface for performing database operations on 'Note' entities with custom search capability.

methods.name: findByTitleContainingIgnoreCaseOrContentContainingIgnoreCase
methods.description: Custom query method to find paginated 'Note' entities where the title or content contains specified substrings, case-insensitive.
